name: SmartGolf Token
description: SmartGolf Token (SGi) powers SMARTGOLF Inc.â€™s Web3 golf ecosystem that combines AI coaching (SmartGolf AIX), DePIN devices and ranges, and RWA tokenization. The platform reconstructs and analyzes swings using proprietary algorithms, provides real-time coaching, and enables golfers to own performance data and earn SGi through Swing-to-Earn activities. The project has been audited by CertiK and legally reviewed, and is officially listed on CoinMarketCap and CoinGecko. Press coverage: Cointelegraph feature (link above).
